definitions.definition: waste gases that come out of a vehicle, an engine or a machine

examples.text: ducts which draw out exhaust air and replace it with fresh
The car was fitted with a catalytic converter to meet exhaust regulations.

definitions.definition: the system in a vehicle through which exhaust gases come out

examples.text: My car needs a new exhaust.

wordOrigin: mid 16th cent. (in the sense ‘draw off or out’): from Latin exhaust- ‘drained out’, from the verb exhaurire, from ex- ‘out’ + haurire ‘draw (water), drain’.
